summary.span: 表示一个服务，该服务提供用于控制 控件的显示和行为的属性和方法。

span.span: Represents a service that provides properties and methods to control the display and behavior of controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含一些属性，这些属性指定与控件相关联的图像和标签的大小和可见性信息。A contains properties that specify size and visibility information for the image and label associated with a control. 如果没有为功能区控件设置该属性 ，则改用属性。If the property is not set for a ribbon control, the property is used instead. 默认控件大小定义基于控件的属性设置。The default control size definition is based on the control's property settings. 如果指定了，则它是默认值。If a is specified, it is the default. 如果为`null`， 并且指定了，则是默认值。If is `null`, and a is specified, the is the default. 如果和都是`null`，则默认情况下，图像设置为。If both the and are `null`, the image is set to by default. 如果属性为 null 或为空，则默认情况下隐藏该属性。If the property is null or empty, it is hidden by default. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为`true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone|

span.span: Gets or sets the for this control when it is hosted in the Quick Access Toolbar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含一些属性，这些属性指定与控件相关联的图像和标签的大小和可见性信息。A contains properties that specify size and visibility information for the image and label associated with a control. 此属性指定当此控件承载于快速访问工具栏时，图像和标签的显示方式。This property specifies how the image and label will appear when this control is hosted in the Quick Access Toolbar. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为`true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone|

summary.span: 标识 依赖项属性。
获取或设置针对此控件显示在工具提示中的说明性文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the descriptive text that is displayed in the ToolTip for this control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!WARNING] > 每个功能区控件继承一个属性。Each ribbon control inherits a property. 如果设置了该属性，则不会显示功能区的增强工具提示，将改为显示标准工具提示。If the property is set, the ribbon's enhanced ToolTip will not be shown; the standard ToolTip will be shown instead. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为`true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone|
